name: Cryptofolio
short_description: Self-hosted cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with real-time price updates.
description: Self-hosted cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with real-time price updates. Cryptofolio is a self-hosted application focused on finance, cryptocurrency, crypto, portfolio. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Cryptofolio on your home server to self-hosted cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with real-time price updates without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Cryptofolio to manage your finance workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
